tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Complicated Pregnancy Treatment,Cervical Cerclage,D&C (Dilation and Curettage),
review:
With a history of preterm birth around 24 weeks Dr Aparna Shintre left no stone unturned when it came to my subsequent pregnancy.It was so methodological:
1.Rubella injection before 3 months of planning to conceive
2.Scan to check for ovulation and an injection to ensure ovulation is on dot 
3.On confirmation of pregnancy with home pregnancy kit a blood test to monitor level of HCG
4.Extremely friendly to clarify minute doubts even over WhatsApp wrt all tests and reports and clear explanation of medical terms with relevant examples during consultation and follow-up
5.Cervical encerclage to prevent preterm birth and injections to prevent contractions
6.Decision at 32.4 weeks to go for emergency c section
7.Quick recovery of stitch(5 days for external heal) 
8.Follow up wrt diet to ensure baby is on exclusive breast milk for first six months atleast
9.Counselling whenever am in self doubt stage which happened many times throughout this journey
10.Follow up wrt my baby's ovarian cyst size 
Overall despite the challenges I faced during my pregnancy I feel meeting her was the best thing which happened in my pregnancy.
Dr Aparna shintre mam is very good doctor. She takes time to understand the person and the condition.thnq mam

I came along with my spouse to CLOUDNINE health facility for her menopause/  mensuration related  issues. CLOUDNINE sahakaranagar health clinic is well equipped as a good diagonastic centre with all advanced equipment required for conducting various test. The physician, the radiologist, the nursing care team, front desk and the in house pharmacy associted with the health-care functions as a well coordinated team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
We had a great experience with Dr. Aparna Shintre. visited her for pregnancy. It was a normal delivery. She took care of all the detailings required for a smooth and safe delivery. She understands the mindset of the patient and clarifies all their doubts. Words are less to thank her for our successful pregnancy.
We would highly recommend to anyone.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Very bad  person I have ever seen .*** *** ****** **** ** ******** ********* ** ***** ** ********* *She suggested me for amniocentesis .She and Dr Kripa Carriapa *** ****** **** *** ********** performed the procedure *** *** *** *** ** ********* **** **** ** rupturing of my amniotic sac...And further because of leak of water my fetus got affected .Now he is born with hyper extended knee and hip dislocation which I was not told when she ordered me for so many ultrasound sounds. Please don't go to her *** ********* ***** ****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Pregnancy Check Up,
review: A positive experience from start to finish, Dr Aparna is not only extremely competent and professional, she explains everything perfectly to a nervous first time mom. Despite requiring an emergency c section, it was a beautiful, positive birth experience that my husband and I will cherish forever.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recommend  strongly  to consult  aparna  Shintre mam. She was so friendly and she made me to deliver healthy baby through  normal delivery in 2020 dat too during covid time.she gave her personal number and told me to cal her any time once I get pain. Even she responded  so quickly and told d hospital duty doctor to continue til she arrives. I m very happy . Thanks a lot mam .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Mrs. Aparna Shintre is one of the best gynaecologist that I have met. Her skill, knowledge and friendliness towards patience are her key attributes. When the baby poops, almost of all gynaecologist will opt for C-section. Aparna is the first doctor who delivered a baby which pooped and still completed the normal delivery. Baby and mom are doing fantastic.

*** **** ************* * **** ********* **** ***. Very friendly approach. I loved her way of explaining things technically. She is unlike other doctors who brush off and don't give a valid explaination to their patients. Though she was not available during my delivery date due to personal reasons, she made sure she was always available on phone to answer my silliest queries. She also handled my delivery remotely and made sure I sailed smoothly through it. I strongly recommend her!

This was our first consultation at Cloud nine hospital Malleshwaram for pregnancy check up. Doctor Aparna Shintre is very friendly and answers all queries related to the issue. The hospital staff is also very friendly making all the process of registration and other stuff with ease. One need not hesitate to ask anything to the doctor and the confidence of the patient is boosted up by the doctor
Can have complete trust

**** *** *** ** **** ** ******* ****** *** will listen to yoyr queries, issues everything. There were lot of complications were there during my pregnancy. Me and my husband we both were worried but the way Dr Aparna has handled the case it was superb.We were worrieded as I had thyroid, gestational diabetes, Low blood sugar ,Low Hemoglobin ..After all this issues she has handled the case in such a way that we were highly obliged after seeing the resukt and now my baby is 1&1/2 year old..All credit goes to Dr Aparna Shintre.Thanks a ton Dr.

We visited Dr. Aparna with a lot of unanswered questions haunting us. We had visited several other doctors both in and outside Cloudnine. My issue was never resolved although the other doctors assured it would be gone. I was referred to Dr. Aparna by a family member who had visited her. After seeing the other reviews and feedback about her on Practo, I went with high hopes. The way she approached me and the kind of interest she showed in my case was impeccable. halfway through our discussion, she made me feel so comfortable as though she had been guiding me all through. She took personal interest and handled my case more than satisfactorily. A big thumbs up to her, would recommend her big time!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy with PCOD,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I consulted with Dr.Aparna since i had issues conceiving. Her guidance *** ********* has been very good right from the start. She has take utmost care about each issue and provided the ***** treatment which has helped me to conceive despite thyroid, PCOD and fibroid issues. Post conceiving I had complications and she has been extra careful with the whole pregnancy cycle and helped me overcome all the issues and deliver a healthy baby. For me she has been the main reason I have been able to go through the whole pregnancy smoothly despite multiple complications. She is very patient and clears all your doubts and is also available to resolve any queries at any time of the day. I would totally recommend Dr.Aparna for pregnancy consultation *** **** *** ** *** ** *** **** ** **********

I would recommend this doctor to everyone who has problems in thier pregnancy. She explains everything clearly of what the issue is and gives ******* medicines to treat it. I'm very much satisfied with her treatment.
